process.name: Test Group on Workqueue
process.narrative: Create, remove and rename group on workqueues

subsheet.name: Create Work Queue Group from Root
Create Queue Under Work Queue Group

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

stage.name: Scenario1: Create, Rename & Delete WQ Group
Note1
stage.narrative: GIVEN I have a valid work queue group structure

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I create work queue group from the root node 'Queues' via the tree control menu item
THEN the user will able to create Work Queues Group from the root node.

exception.detail: "The queue was meant to be removed from its group via the tree menu item and return to default, it doesn't seem to be in the default group."
"The queue was meant to be removed from its group via the tree menu item, however its still there."

stage.name: Check Queue isn't in orginal group

input.name: Tree Item
input.narrative: The name of the tree item you want to get the children for.

output.name: Child Tree Item
output.narrative: A collection containing a list child tree items.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I rename a work queue group via the tree control menu item
THEN the user will able to rename the group successfully.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Tree Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the tree item you want to right click on.

input.name: Match Index
input.narrative: Default to 1, If the tree item appears more than once.

input.name: Menu Item
input.narrative: The name of the menu item you want to select.

exception.detail: "The queue was meant to be removed from its sub group via the tree menu item and return to default, it doesn't seem to be in the default group."

input.name: Tree Item
input.narrative: The name of the tree item you want to get the children for.

output.name: Child Tree Item
output.narrative: A collection containing a list child tree items.

exception.detail: "The queue was meant to be removed from its sub group via the tree menu item, however its still there."

stage.name: Check User isn't in orginal group

input.name: Tree Item
input.narrative: The name of the tree item you want to get the children for.

output.name: Child Tree Item
output.narrative: A collection containing a list child tree items.

stage.name: Create Work Queue Group from Root

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the group you are making.

input.name: Target Group
input.narrative: The group you want to create the new group inside. This will default to "Queues"

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the group you are making.

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Rename Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the group you are making to rename

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: WorkQueue group name to delete

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I delete a work queue group via the tree control menu item
THEN the user will able to delete the group successfully.

stage.name: Create Work Queue Parent Group from Root

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the group you are making.

input.name: Target Group
input.narrative: The group you want to create the new group inside. This will default to "Queues"

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Work Queue Group Parent Name
input.narrative: The name of the parent group.

input.name: Work Queue Sub Group Name
input.narrative: The name of the sub group to create.

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the group you are making.

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Rename Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the group you are making to rename

stage.name: Rename Work Queue Sub Group Name

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: WorkQueue group name to delete

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

stage.name: Scenario2: Create, Rename & Delete WQ Sub Group
Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I create work queue sub group from the existing group via the tree control menu item
THEN the user will able to create Work Queues Sub Group successfully.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I rename a work queue sub group from the parent group via the tree control menu item
THEN the user will able to rename the sub group successfully.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I delete a work queue sub group via the tree control menu item
THEN the user will able to delete the sub group successfully.

stage.name: Scenario3: Create, Remove Queue under Work Queue Group & Work Queue Sub Group
Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I create queue under the work queue group
THEN the user will able to create queue under Work Queues Group successfully.

stage.name: Create Queue Under Work Queue Group
Create Queue Under Work Queue Group

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the group you are making.

input.name: Target Group
input.narrative: The group you want to create the new group inside. This will default to "Queues"

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the work queue

input.name: Key Field
input.narrative: The key field for the work queue

input.name: Active
input.narrative: Flag indicating if the work queue should be made active or not - default is True, ie. Active

input.name: Max Attempts
input.narrative: The maximum number of attempts to allow on this queue

input.name: Set Encryption?
input.narrative: This is a flag to tick the encryption tickbox for a queue.

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: This is the name of the scheme in which you wish to encrypt the queue with.

input.name: Set Active Queue
input.narrative: True or False, do you want to make this an active queue.

input.name: Assigned Process
input.narrative: The name of the proccess you wish to assign to the active queue.

input.name: Assigned Resource Group
input.narrative: The name of the resoruce group you want to assign to the active queue.

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: WorkQueue group name to select

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Work Queue Group Parent Name
input.narrative: The name of the parent group.

input.name: Work Queue Sub Group Name
input.narrative: The name of the sub group to create.

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the work queue

input.name: Key Field
input.narrative: The key field for the work queue

input.name: Active
input.narrative: Flag indicating if the work queue should be made active or not - default is True, ie. Active

input.name: Max Attempts
input.narrative: The maximum number of attempts to allow on this queue

input.name: Set Encryption?
input.narrative: This is a flag to tick the encryption tickbox for a queue.

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: This is the name of the scheme in which you wish to encrypt the queue with.

input.name: Set Active Queue
input.narrative: True or False, do you want to make this an active queue.

input.name: Assigned Process
input.narrative: The name of the proccess you wish to assign to the active queue.

input.name: Assigned Resource Group
input.narrative: The name of the resoruce group you want to assign to the active queue.

input.name: Tree Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the tree item you want to right click on.

input.name: Match Index
input.narrative: Default to 1, If the tree item appears more than once.

input.name: Menu Item
input.narrative: The name of the menu item you want to select.

input.name: Tree Item
input.narrative: The name of the tree item you want to get the children for.

output.name: Child Tree Item
output.narrative: A collection containing a list child tree items.

stage.name: Select the Work Queue Sub Group

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: WorkQueue group name to select

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I remove a queue from the work queue group
THEN the queue will able to move to it's original root 'Queues' successfully.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN I remove a queue from the work queue sub group
THEN the queue will able to move to it's original root 'Queues' successfully.

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: WorkQueue group name to delete

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: WorkQueue group name to delete

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to delete

input.name: Delete option on trend data warning message
input.friendlyname: Delete option on trend data warning message
input.narrative: To select 'Yes' or 'No' to confirm whether or not to delete a work queue if it has trend data associated to it

output.name: Trend data warning message when deleting a queue
output.friendlyname: Trend data warning message when deleting a queue
output.narrative: The warning message given when trying to delete a queue that has been enabled to a snapshot configuration

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to delete

input.name: Delete option on trend data warning message
input.friendlyname: Delete option on trend data warning message
input.narrative: To select 'Yes' or 'No' to confirm whether or not to delete a work queue if it has trend data associated to it

output.name: Trend data warning message when deleting a queue
output.friendlyname: Trend data warning message when deleting a queue
output.narrative: The warning message given when trying to delete a queue that has been enabled to a snapshot configuration

input.name: Work Queue Group Name
input.narrative: WorkQueue group name to delete

input.name: Target Group Match Index
input.narrative: If the target group exists more than once this way you can target specific ones.
